functions.function_ast:
FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='main',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='main',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='chaine1',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            ArrayDecl(
              dim_quals=[],
              type=
                TypeDecl(
                  declname='chaine1',
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    IdentifierType(
                      names=['char'],
                    )
                )
              dim=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='100',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='chaine2',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            ArrayDecl(
              dim_quals=[],
              type=
                TypeDecl(
                  declname='chaine2',
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    IdentifierType(
                      names=['char'],
                    )
                )
              dim=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='100',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='strcpy',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                ID(
                  name='chaine1',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Bonjour"',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='strcpy',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                ID(
                  name='chaine2',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"XAllo a tout le monde!"',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='==',
              left=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='strcmp',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        ID(
                          name='chaine1',
                        )
                      exprs[1]=
                        ID(
                          name='chaine2',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='0',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"Les chaines sont identiques!\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iffalse=
            If(
              cond=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='>',
                  left=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='strcmp',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            ID(
                              name='chaine1',
                            )
                          exprs[1]=
                            ID(
                              name='chaine2',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
              iftrue=
                Compound(
                  block_items[0]=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='printf',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            Constant(
                              type='string',
                              value='"Chaine1 est plus grande que chaine2!\\n"',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              iffalse=
                Compound(
                  block_items[0]=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='printf',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            Constant(
                              type='string',
                              value='"Chaine1 est plus petite que chaine2!\\n"',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)
